comments:
I got the following exception using Checkout Into. The problem is not 
reproducable but I did notice that the operation is modifying sync info in the 
manageFolders method outside of an EclipseFolder#run. This may have been the 
cause of a current modification.

org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.util.AssertionFailedException: null 
argument:
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.util.Assert.isNotNull(Assert.java:78)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.util.Assert.isNotNull(Assert.java:66)
at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseSynchronizer.setFolderSync
(EclipseSynchronizer.java:132)

(EclipseFolder.java:204)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseSynchronizer.run
(EclipseSynchronizer.java:1317)

(EclipseFolder.java:298)

at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseFolder.run
(EclipseFolder.java:295)
at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseFolder.setFolderSyncInfo
(EclipseFolder.java:201)
at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.CheckoutIntoOperation.manageFolder
(CheckoutIntoOperation.java:396)
at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.CheckoutIntoOperation.manageFolder
s(CheckoutIntoOperation.java:381)

(CheckoutIntoOperation.java:370)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.CheckoutIntoOperation.checkout
(CheckoutIntoOperation.java:114)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.CheckoutOperation.checkout
(CheckoutOperation.java:46)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.CheckoutIntoOperation.checkout
(CheckoutIntoOperation.java:126)

(CheckoutOperation.java:31)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.CVSOperation.run
(CVSOperation.java:128)
at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.CVSNonblockingRunnableContext.run
(CVSNonblockingRunnableContext.java:47)

org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.operations.CVSNonblockingRunnableContext$2.ru

at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:61)

I also noticed that some of the folders that should be managed are not. 
Probably caused by the background auto-build unmanaging orphaned folders 
before the checkout into completed. We'll need to make sure the run 
encapsulates the whole operation.
